EmailTemplate.description: This template should be used for WM correspondence when the other templates available do not work for the type of request/email response you are sending.
EmailTemplate.name: Vendor: Standard WM (CE Email Templates)
EmailTemplate.subject: MAS: {!Asset.MAS_Company_Account_Number__c} - {!Case.Case_Type__c}- {!Case.Case_Subtype_Email_Format__c} - Ref. #: {!Case.Reference_Number__c} - {!Case.Location_Code__c}
